title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the secure data collaboration platform, including functional and non-functional requirements, data security and privacy considerations, and user stories.

title: Design System Architecture for SecureDataCollaborationPlatform
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. This design will address security, scalability, performance requirements, and data privacy/protection mechanisms while considering the platform's primary function of enabling secure data sharing and collaboration between organizations without exposing raw data. The design will serve as a foundation for the platform’s development.
dependencies: Conduct Risk Assessment and Compliance Review

title: Develop Data Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement robust data security and privacy measures, such as encryption, access control, and data anonymization techniques, to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of shared data.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop a user-friendly interface for data sharing and collaboration, including features for data upload, access control, and collaboration tools.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Develop backend services for data storage, processing, and secure sharing, including APIs for integration with other systems.
dependencies: Develop Data Security and Privacy Measures

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement a secure and scalable database and data storage solution for storing and managing shared data.
dependencies: Develop Data Security and Privacy Measures

title: Implement Authentication and Authorization
description: Develop a robust authentication and authorization system to ensure secure access to the platform and shared data.
dependencies: Develop Data Security and Privacy Measures

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the platform to ensure consistent and reliable releases.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance plan to ensure the platform meets functional and non-functional requirements, including security and performance testing.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Develop detailed technical documentation, including installation guides, API references, and user manuals, to support the deployment and usage of the platform.
